CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 1, 1953, pg. 12 reads: "Annual Breakfast Is Gala - The gala annual breakfast given by the smart Min-Ceil Club on the lawn of the Emmett Davises of Lincoln Avenue, draw its usual socialite group of guests. Some snapped here include, top left, Mrs. PIC. Jackson of Charlottesville, Va.; Mrs. T. C. Ervin, New Port News, Va.; Mrs. Thomas Bolden, Mrs. Earl Simms, Mrs. Herbert U. White of Detroit and her hostess, Mrs. M.R. Hadley, of McKeesport, and to her right, Mrs. Alvin P. Lee of Detroit, cousin of Mrs. Hadley.  Standing are Mrs. John K. Wood, Mrs. Wesley I. Howell of Cleveland, Jean Bolden Farrish, Dr. M.W. Hadley, Mrs. Joseph Price, Mrs. Emmett Davis, Dr. Earl S. Sims and Mrs. Helen Robinson...Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of guests of Min-Ceil Club, seated from left: Mrs. Jackson, Mrs. T. C. Ervin, Mrs. Thomas Bolden, Mrs. Earl Simms, Mrs. Herbert U. White, Mrs. M. R. Hadley, and Mrs. Alvin P. Lee; standing: Mrs. John K. Wood, Mrs. Wesley I. Howell, Jean Bolden Farrish, Dr. M. W. Hadley, Mrs. Joseph Price, Mrs. Emmett Davis, Dr. Earl S. Sims, and Mrs. Helen Robinson, gathered for gala annual breakfast, home of Mr. and Mrs. Emmett Davis, Lincoln Avenue
